title: The year of the network
description: Independent, nonprofit news organizations will increasingly link up in 2026 to reap the benefits of a tried and tested legacy media structure: the network. One of the great stories in journalism over the last decade has been the remarkable rise in independent and nonprofit newsrooms. Here’s one measure: membership in the Institute for Nonprofit News...
